Adorable burger and brunch spot near Basilica la Sagrada Familia. Tried to have lunch before our 2:00 p.m. tour of the bascilica got there around 1:00 but with only one couple ordering in front of us could tell we wouldn't have the opportunity to enjoy our lunch and not be rushed or late.  So we decided to come back another day and so glad we did.  Agree, not the fastest service but that seems to be typical of Barcelona unless you are doing take away.  We started with the fries and a salad which they brought out pretty soon after we ordered.  Both were great!  The fries were hot, crisp and well seasoned.  The ketchup on the table had a curry taste.  Not my cup of tea but my daughter liked it.  I used the mustard which was spicy and more to my liking. The salad was fresh and veggies were great. Tomatoes looked right off the farm.  Nicely dressed with a balsamic lemon vinaigrette. For man course I had the fried eggs on a sausage with fresh bread.  The eggs tasted fresh off the farm.  The eggs were perfectly cooked the yolk was runny the way I like it.  My daughter had the burger.  Which I didn't try but she loved it.  I did try the herbed mustard which came on the side it was lovely.  A great experience  Lovely staff. Great space.  Would absolutely go back again,  However, do give yourself time.  I should add that they were cleaning up after the lunch rush (got there around 2:00) and they had us wait about 10 minutes before they could take our order.  They did comp our meal because of the wait which was not necessary but much appreciated.
